text: Joe Spargur, popularly known as Joe London, is a professional record producer and songwriter. Joe has had recent success in the pop music world with the release of singles with Pitbull, Jason Derulo, Fifth Harmony and LunchMoney Lewis. ==Discography== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !!
